entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 30 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h except 50 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
